last_episode_to_air.name: Last Day
last_episode_to_air.overview: It's the last day of the school holidays and, at the local pool, Alex is determined to get Nicola alone to profess his love for her.

name: Worst Year of My Life, Again!
original_name: Worst Year of My Life, Again!
overview: What if you woke up one morning to discover you had to relive the most excruciating 12 months of high school all over again? Alex King has had a horrible year - humiliated by his teachers, targeted by bullies and embarrassed by attempts to impress the most popular girl in school. So when he wakes up on his birthday to discover that somehow time has reset itself, he can't believe he must relive every miserable moment of the past 12 months once more. Until his friends Simon Birch and Maddy Kent convince him he's being offered a second chance and maybe this time round, he can get it right.

episodes.name: Happy Birthday
episodes.overview: Alex King wakes up on the morning of his 15th birthday to discover that time has reset itself and he must relive the worst year of his life all over again.

episodes.name: Valentine's Day
episodes.overview: Valentine's Day is Alex's perfect opportunity to woo the girl of his dreams, but his declaration of love ends up in the wrong hands.

episodes.name: Beach
episodes.overview: It's fund-raising day at the life-saving club, and Alex gets on the wrong side of his nemesis Mr Norris, as Gibbo and The Gal from EZ1-FM kick-off a treasure hunt.

episodes.name: April Fool
episodes.overview: Alex intends to use his 'loop year' to turn the tables on Simon, who has used him as his April Fool target each year.

episodes.name: Sam's Party
episodes.overview: When Alex and his sister Sam are left home alone for the night, they decide they should host a house party - with disastrous consequences.

episodes.name: Maths Test
episodes.overview: Alex arrives late to Mr Norris's maths lesson, resulting in Mr Norris giving the whole class a maths test.

episodes.name: Match Day
episodes.overview: It's the grand final for Alex's soccer team the Mad Dogs, but after he causes a major mix up in a sports store, it's up to Alex's soccer-mad Dad to step in and save the day.

episodes.name: Cross Country
episodes.overview: Alex is determined to win the boys' cross country race, even if he has to cheat.

episodes.name: School Play
episodes.overview: Alex is thrilled when he gets the chance to play Romeo opposite Nicola's Juliet in the school play. Can he finally land a kiss with his dream girl?

episodes.name: Halloween
episodes.overview: Alex creates a cool costume to wear to Nicola's Halloween celebrations, but will he get to the party without getting trick or treated?

episodes.name: Concert Tickets
episodes.overview: Alex realizes he's got a chance to win Nicola over when he sees an opportunity to get hold of concert tickets for her favorite band Boys AZ-1. He's just got to chase down a garbage truck and dig through his own household rubbish first.

episodes.name: Christmas
episodes.overview: Alex does everything he can to speed up his mum's Christmas Day plans, so he can get to Nicola's beach barbeque party.

episodes.name: Last Day
episodes.overview: It's the last day of the school holidays and, at the local pool, Alex is determined to get Nicola alone to profess his love for her.
